page.title: 15WESTMESTON FARM SUSSEX
page.content: {FARMING The present owner of this farm took over in the 1960s.He started off building a herd of pedigree cattle, but now he is an arable and sheep farmer.The owner has contractors to do ploughing,sowing,havesting and mechanical work on the land including the cutting down of stag trees. {LAND COVER The farm covers an approximate area of 150 acres.The 3 main buildings are, the main house,the corn bin house. which is now used for the ewes when lambing.In the garden there is an orchard and a swimming pool. {GROUND CONDITION. The land is a mixture of flat and steep hilly ground.The last owner of the farm used the land for sheep grazing and therefore none of it was ploughed.
